title: How to Make Zucchini and Cherry Tomato Quiche

steps.headline: Blind bake the base if not already done.
Cut the zucchini into fine rounds.
Gently cook the zucchini rounds with the finely chopped onion.
Whisk the eggs with the fresh cream.
steps.description: Add salt and pepper to taste.

steps.headline: Cut the tomato cherries in halves.
Arrange the vegetables on the quiche pastry base.
Pour the egg and cream mixture over the vegetables.
Place in the oven and cook for 25 minutes.
steps.description: Check that it is done with the point of a knife.

steps.headline: Remove and serve immediately.
steps.description: It can also be served cold.

text: Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF.  Blind bake the base if not already done. Do so for 12 minutes. Cut the zucchini into fine rounds.  Gently cook the zucchini rounds with the finely chopped onion.  Whisk the eggs with the fresh cream. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cut the tomato cherries in halves.  Arrange the vegetables on the quiche pastry base.  Pour the egg and cream mixture over the vegetables.  Place in the oven and cook for 25 minutes. Check that it is done with the point of a knife. Remove and serve immediately. It can also be served cold.
